name: 23 Deaths From Hell
description:
FAST-PACED FPS CARD BATTLER! Defeat foes in the purgatory, but your only way of progression is death.

NOTE: THIS GAME IS MUCH EASIER WITH HEADPHONES Cards- a breakdown (read these if you don’t want a learning experience) Time- the number in blue. Shows how long the card’s cooldown is, in milliseconds 

Repetition- the number in yellow. How many times this attack repeats per use 

Damage- the number in red. Shows how much damage per attack

Durability- the number in green. Shows how many times you can use the card before it disappears 

Heres some instructions for people who cant understand:

WASD to move, SPACE to jump

ESC to pause(settings are there)

right click, left click, middle click or 1 2 3 for using cards

To start the game, destroy the totem in the middle

R to reload cards manually 

Hold shift when using cards to discard them

When you reach 0 lives, you lose

CREDITS

Game by Yollie

Music by Neverdusk

  • Hades' Chariot (Battle Theme 1)
  • Seething Evil (Battle Theme 2)
  • Muted Warmth (Menu Theme)

Additional Music by Blue Lava

  • Meteor Tag (Battle Theme 3)
